Name: NS2: Combat
About the game: NS2: Combat includes seven different player-controllable lifeforms, a vault full of weapons and abilities, a stats system, full modding support and five original maps. Games last around 15 minutes and players may join and leave at any time without disrupting gameplay. Faultline Games is a game developer that started as a mod team. Our indie-publisher, Unknown Worlds , also started as a mod team. NS2: Combat evolved from the modding community of Natural Selection 2 to become a standalone game. It does not require Natural Selection 2 in order to play.
Meta Title: NS2: Combat: Oct 31, 2014, Faultline Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on NS2: Combat? Check out the release date (Oct 31, 2014), developer insights from Faultline Games, and a complete game summary.
